name: voting-system-project
description: This project is a user-friendly web application designed for computer engineering students to conduct project evaluations. Built using Node.js and MongoDB, it offers a secure login, a sleek project showcase, intuitive voting, and real-time result updates. The platform promotes collaboration, fair evaluations, and showcases technological excellence.
author: Aslı Gizem Ulusoy, Ramiz Kadayıfçı, Furkan Şakir Ünal, Uygar Evciman, Abitter Kaan Uçar
